Class Sprite

  • java.lang.Object
    • javafx.scene.image.Image
      • Sprite

  • public class Sprite
extends javafx.scene.image.Image
    Loads a sprite to be used in the GameArena. This class represents a Sprite object. When combined with the GameArena class, instances of the Sprite class can be displayed on the screen.

    • Property Summary

      • Properties inherited from class javafx.scene.image.Image

      • Sprite

        public Sprite(java.lang.String url,
              double x,
              double y,
              double w,
              double h)
        Constructor, create a Sprite from the given URL.
        Parameters:
        url - URL to the Sprite png
        x - the intial xPosition of the sprite
        y - the intial yPosition of the sprite
        w - the intial width of the sprite
        h - the intial height of the sprite
